install.name: VM - Product Slide Show
install.author: Pinemodule
install.description: JQuery Based Product display silde show

field.name: productIds
field.label: Product IDs
field.description: comma separted ids of the products

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width (px)

field.name: height
field.label: height
field.description: height (px)

field.name: startigSlide
field.label: Starting Slide
field.description: Zero-based index of the first slide to be displayed

field.name: productName
field.label: Product Name
field.description: Name of the product

field.name: productWeight
field.label: Product Weight
field.description: Product Weight

field.name: productWeightType
field.label: Product Weight Type
field.description: Category of product weight

field.name: productLength
field.label: Product Length
field.description: Length of the product

field.name: productPrice
field.label: Product Price
field.description: Price of the product

field.name: productInStock
field.label: Product In Stock
field.description: Product Stock Information

field.name: productSales
field.label: Product Sales
field.description: Total Sales

field.name: categoryName
field.label: Category Name
field.description: Category name

field.name: speed
field.label: Speed
field.description: speed of the transition (any valid fx speed value)

field.name: speedIn
field.label: Speed In
field.description: speed of the 'in' transition

field.name: speedOut
field.label: Speed Out
field.description: speed of the 'out' transition

field.name: fx
field.label: Fx
field.description: Name of transition effect (or comma separated names, ex: 'fade,scrollUp,shuffle')

field.name: timeOut
field.label: Time Out
field.description: Milliseconds between slide transitions (0 to disable auto advance)

field.name: timeoutFn
field.label: Time Out Function
field.description: callback for determining per-slide timeout value

field.name: pause
field.label: Pause
field.description: true to enable pause on hover

field.name: shuffle
field.label: Shuffle
field.description: Shuffle Animation

field.name: easeIn
field.label: Ease In
field.description: Easing for in transition

field.name: easeOut
field.label: Ease Out
field.description: Easing for out transition

field.name: easing
field.label: Easing
field.description: Easing method for both in and out transitions

field.name: next
field.label: Next
field.description: Element, jQuery object, or jQuery selector string for the element to use as event trigger for next slide

field.name: end
field.label: End
field.description: Callback invoked when the slideshow terminates (use with autostop or nowrap options): function(options)

field.name: prev
field.label: Previous
field.description: Element, jQuery object, or jQuery selector string for the element to use as event trigger for previous slide

field.name: backwards
field.label: Backwards
field.description: true to start slideshow at last slide and move backwards through the stack

field.name: activePagerClass
field.label: ActivePager Class
field.description: Class name used for the active pager element

field.name: after
field.label: After
field.description: Transition Callback

field.name: allowPagerClickBubble
field.label: Allow Pager Click Bubble
field.description: Allows or prevents click event on pager anchors from bubbling

field.name: animIn
field.label: Animation In
field.description: Properties that define how the slide animates out

field.name: animOut
field.label: Animation Out
field.description: Properties that define how the slide animates out

field.name: autostop
field.label: Animation Stop
field.description: True to end slideshow after X transitions (where X == slide count)

field.name: autostopCount
field.label: Auto Stop Count
field.description: Number of transitions

field.name: backwards
field.label: Backwards
field.description: true to start slideshow at last slide and move backwards through the stack

field.name: before
field.label: Before
field.description: Transition Callback

field.name: cleartype
field.label: Clear Type
field.description: Support Opacity, // true if clearType corrections should be applied (for IE)

field.name: containerResize
field.label: Container Resize
field.description: Resize container to fit largest slide

field.name: cleartypeNoBg
field.label: Clear Type No Bg
field.description: Set to true to disable extra cleartype fixing (leave false to force background color setting on slides)

field.name: continuous
field.label: Continuous
field.description: True to start next transition immediately after current one completes

field.name: cssAfter
field.label: CSS After
field.description: Properties that defined the state of the slide after transitioning out

field.name: cssBefore
field.label: CSS Before
field.description: Properties that define the initial state of the slide before transitioning in

field.name: fastOnEvent
field.label: Fast on Event
field.description: Force fast transitions when triggered manually (via pager or prev/next); value == time in ms

field.name: fit
field.label: Fit
field.description: Force slides to fit container

field.name: fxFn
field.label: FxFn
field.description: Function used to control the transition: function(currSlideElement, nextSlideElement, options, afterCalback, forwardFlag)

field.name: manualTrump
field.label: Manual Trump
field.description: causes manual transition to stop an active transition instead of being ignored

field.name: metaAttr
field.label: Meta Attribute
field.description: Data - attribute that holds the option data for the slideshow

field.name: nowrap
field.label: No Wrap
field.description: True to prevent slideshow from wrapping

field.name: onPagerEvent
field.label: On Pager Event
field.description: Callback fn for pager events: function(zeroBasedSlideIndex, slideElement)

field.name: onPrevNextEvent
field.label: On Previous Next Event
field.description: Callback fn for prev/next events: function(isNext, zeroBasedSlideIndex, slideElement)

field.name: pager
field.label: Pager
field.description: Element, jQuery object, or jQuery selector string for the element to use as pager container

field.name: pagerAnchorBuilder
field.label: Pager Anchor Builder
field.description: Callback fn for building anchor links: function(index, DOMelement)

field.name: pagerEvent
field.label: Pager Event
field.description: Name of event which drives the pager navigation

field.name: pauseOnPagerHover
field.label: Pause On Pager Hover
field.description: Callback fn for building anchor links: function(index, DOMelement)

field.name: prevNextEvent
field.label: Previous Next Event
field.description: Event which drives the manual transition to the previous or next slide

field.name: randomizeEffects
field.label: Randomize Effects
field.description: Valid when multiple effects are used; true to make the effect sequence random

field.name: requeueOnImageNotLoaded
field.label: Requeue On Image Not Loaded
field.description: requeue the slideshow if any image slides are not yet loaded

field.name: requeueTimeout
field.label: Requeue Timeout
field.description: Ms delay for requeue

field.name: rev
field.label: Reverse
field.description: Causes animations to transition in reverse (for effects that support it such as scrollHorz/scrollVert/shuffle)

field.name: requeueTimeout
field.label: Requeue Timeout
field.description: Ms delay for requeue

field.name: rev
field.label: Reverse
field.description: Causes animations to transition in reverse (for effects that support it such as scrollHorz/scrollVert/shuffle)

field.name: slideExpr
field.label: Slide Expression
field.description: expression for selecting slides (if something other than all children is required)

field.name: slideResize
field.label: Slide Resize
field.description: Force slide width/height to fixed size before every transition

field.name: updateActivePagerLink
field.label: Update Active Pager Link
field.description: Callback fn invoked to update the active pager link (adds/removes activePagerClass style)
